message.name: NOTIFY_CASE_OWNER_WAITLIST_ENTRY_EXPIRED_BODY
message.locale: A funding wait list entry for %1s has expired.

message.name: NOTIFY_CASE_OWNER_WAITLIST_ENTRY_UPDATED_BODY
message.locale: A fund wait list entry for %1s and Case %2s has been updated.

message.name: ERR_FV_BUDGETADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_ZERO
message.locale: The amount must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_FUNDEDITEMRULESLINK_XRV_FUNDING_RULESET_WITH_DATERANGE_EXISTS
message.locale: The Date Range you have chosen is overlapping with an existing Funding Rule Set Association for the same product.

message.name: ERR_FUNDEDITEMRULESLINK_XRV_RULE_SET_ASSOCIATION_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_IF_USED_FOR_ALLOCATION
message.locale: The Funding Rule Set Association cannot be deleted as this has been used to allocate Fund Line Items to fund/fiscal year.

message.name: ERR_FUNDEDITEMRULESLINK_XRV_OBLIGATION_IS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_FUND_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: The Funding Rule Set Association cannot be deleted, there are obligations created against the fund for this product or service.

message.name: ERR_FUNDEDITEMRULESLINK_XRV_OBLIGATION_IS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_FUND_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The Funding Rule Set Association cannot be modified, there are obligations created against the fund for this product or service.
